p.s: remember when you told me that student exchanges are a waste of time?
This makes me think wetherwhether student exchanges are a good idea to spend a semester or as you said a complete waste of time.
In my opinion, going on a student exchange could be a fun and helpful way to spend one or two semesters going abroad, for several reasons.
First, being in another country can help you become a multilingual as there is no better way to learn a language than talking to foreign people.
This is especially important at school or university and later in workplace.
Therefore, you are able to communicate with more people around the world.
Moreover, student exchanges help you crossing personal and cultural boundaries as you get to experience plenty of new things and cultures.
This helps you learning about different cultures, too become more cosmopolitan and open minded and forget about the differences of each and every culture.
Of course, being in a different country can be scary and terrifying at the beginning, but the foreign people are more than willed to help you to find your way.
Simple student exchanges can help make the world a better place by working together and forgetting about our differences.
The world is more connected than ever and taking part in student exchanges is incredibly helpful at finding better jobs.
All in all, I think that student exchanges are a good way of spending a semester because people come together and learn about their cultures which makes the world a better place.
In any case, someday, I want to take part in a student exchange.
I hope I was able to maybe change your opinion and overthink what you said.
